articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: American Airlines shares tumble as outlook falls short - CNBC
articles.description: American forecast a wider than expected loss for the first quarter, sending shares lower.
articles.content:
American Airlines' first-quarter earnings outlook on Thursday fell short of analysts' estimates, sending its shares down more than 7% in early trading.
The carrier forecast an adjusted loss per shar… [+2354 chars]
